Date.description: The date of the data point

BTC.description: The price of Bitcoin on the given date

NYSE.description: The closing price of the New York Stock Exchange on the given date

NASDAQ.description: The closing price of the NASDAQ Stock Exchange on the given date

LSE.description: The closing price of the London Stock Exchange on the given date

BTC_Volume.description: The trading volume of Bitcoin on the given date

NYSE_Volume.description: The trading volume on the New York Stock Exchange on the given date

NASDAQ_Volume.description: The trading volume on the NASDAQ Stock Exchange on the given date

LSE_Volume.description: The trading volume on the London Stock Exchange on the given date
